thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.es | 5 de 71
thread.title: Jelena Redli

author: Jelena Redli
title: Jelena Redli
text: Mr. Nitin has been of great help in completing my payment which was on stand by until I solved an issue with my debit card. He has been very kind and highly professional, very thorough in checking the details and possibilities so that my flight terms remain unchanged. Upon the completion of my booking, I immediately received the confirmation and the tickets on my email address so I didn't have to wait more. Everything considered, I am glad to have chosen eDreams for booking my flight and to have had Mr. Nitin's assistance.
